name: Live Edge Walnut Dining Table
description: Stunning live edge walnut dining table that seats 6-8 people. Features beautiful natural grain patterns and a hand-rubbed oil finish. Built with traditional joinery techniques for lasting durability.

name: Cherry Wood Coffee Table
description: Mid-century modern inspired coffee table crafted from sustainably sourced cherry wood. Features clean lines, subtle curves, and a rich natural finish that will deepen with age.

name: Handcrafted Cutting Board Set
description: Set of three cutting boards in different sizes, made from end-grain maple and walnut. Food-safe mineral oil finish. Perfect for everyday use or as a gift for cooking enthusiasts.

name: Oak Bookshelf with Adjustable Shelves
description: Tall oak bookshelf with 5 adjustable shelves. Traditional mortise and tenon construction ensures stability and longevity. Perfect for displaying books, art, and collectibles.

name: Maple and Walnut Serving Tray
description: Elegant serving tray featuring contrasting maple and walnut woods in a geometric pattern. Food-safe finish makes it perfect for entertaining or everyday use.

name: Custom Bedroom Dresser
description: Six-drawer dresser made from sustainably harvested cherry wood. Features soft-close drawer slides, dovetail joints, and a hand-applied shellac finish. Can be customized to your specifications.
